availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, resident. Bedford County, Virginia, native. Married to Polly Bush Eubank. Married to Nancy Ware Eubank. Father of Stephen Eubank and Ambrose Eubank. Resident in Clark County in 1830. Owned one enslaved person in Clark County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Fifth Manuscript Census of the United States (1830), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, p. 75.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2.
William Elsey Connelley and E.M. Coulter, History of Kentucky, Vol. 5 (Chicago: The American Historical Society, 1922), 303.
